Description: Bowl of marl pottery with a flat base and an incurved rim, smoothed on interior and along outer rim; trimmed around lower body. Possibly coated with buff slip.
Curator's comments: For this site, see W. M. F. Petrie, 'Diospolis Parva : the cemeteries of Abadiyeh and Hu, 1898-9' (London, 1901). Late ware L17f in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921).
